metadata.description: Prefix for resource names (e.g., company name or project identifier)
Name of the application (used as prefix for resource names)
SMS sender number for Azure Communication Services (E.164 format, e.g. +15555555555)
Data location for Azure Communication Services
DNS zone name for custom domain (e.g., helios.example.com). Leave empty to skip DNS provisioning.
Hostname prefix for the web app CNAME within the DNS zone (e.g., portal -> portal.helios.example.com)
Azure AD Tenant ID for authentication
Azure AD Client ID for authentication
Entra security group object IDs for directory-driven features
IP addresses to allow access to Cosmos DB, Storage, and Key Vault (for local development/portal access)
